means: 布局凌乱的，杂乱无章的
（无目的地）漫游( ramble的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: Victorian houses can seem cold with their lofty ceilings and rambling rooms.
sentence.Network_cn: 维多利亚式房屋屋顶高耸，房间布局凌乱，因此可能会显得较为阴冷。

sentence.Network_en: He stood in my kitchen drinking beer, rambling on about Lillian.
sentence.Network_cn: 他站在我的厨房里喝着啤酒，漫无边际地讲着有关莉莲的事情。

sentence.Network_en: Cameron wrote a rambling letter to his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡梅伦给他的妻子写了一封漫无边际的长信。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 领事馆官员称，王立军一开始是语无伦次（rambling），但最后还是让美方了解到了涉及中国权力、政治和腐败的错综交织。美官员认 …
《Friends》词汇表B ... nighttime nighttimen. 夜间 rambling adj. 漫步的, 散漫的, 流浪性的 newfound adj. 新发现的,新得到的.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●quicken v. 加快 ●rambling adj. 杂乱无章的 ●sentimentally adv. 感情上，多情地.
杂,杂字的解释,... ... 杂交[ hybrid] 杂乱无章[ mess;rambling; be disorderly and unsytematic] 杂牌，杂牌儿[ inferior brand].

list.abs: they rambled on through the woods .他们漫步穿过树林。
ramble about 闲逛ramble on 继续漫步地ramble over 闲逛
rambling farm street , see building of an a residential building , office building , bazaar unplugs and case , flowers of pine , bush clusters round meantime .漫步农场街头，只见座座住宅楼、办公楼、商场楼拔地而起，青松、灌木花丛簇拥其间。

entry.tran: （建筑）大而无当的，格局凌乱的
entry.def: A rambling building is big and old with an irregular shape.

example.ex: ...that rambling house and its bizarre contents.
example.tran: 那间格局不规则的房子及其奇异的室内摆设

entry.tran: （讲话或写作）冗长含糊的，杂乱无章的
entry.def: If you describe a speech or piece of writing as rambling, you are criticizing it for being too long and very confused.

example.ex: His actions were accompanied by a rambling monologue...
example.tran: 他的行动伴随着一串冗长含糊的独白。

example.ex: Cameron wrote a rambling letter to his wife.
example.tran: 卡梅伦给他的妻子写了一封漫无边际的长信。

means.word_mean: 1. (of e.g. speech and writing) tending to depart from the main point or cover a wide range of subjects;

sentences.sentence: "amusingly digressive with satirical thrusts at women's fashions among other things"
"a rambling speech about this and that"

auth_sentence.content: I had better stop there before I stop rambling.

sentences.en: It was easy to get lost in the rambling house.
sentences.cn: 在布局凌乱的大房子里容易迷路。
